collectible.title: The Money You Could be Saving with Geico
collectible.subtitle: The Money You Could be Saving with Geico
collectible.text:
This is The Money You Could be Saving with Geico.
Geico. Fifteen minutes could save you fifteen percent or more on car insurance.

collectible.title: I Met Kool-Aid Man Sticker
collectible.subtitle: Proof you met the legend himself
collectible.text: "Here you go! Proof you met me!"
